title: Schema that defines the set of fields to be filled for a submission to OpenEBench database

consolidated_oeb_data.title: Consolidated dataset path or URL
consolidated_oeb_data.description: Path or publicly reachable URL to the consolidated dataset, coming from an OpenEBench standardized benchmarking workflow (e.g.https://github.com/inab/TCGA_benchmarking_workflow

data_visibility.title: Datasets visibility
data_visibility.description: The desired visibility of the submitted datasets, which must be acknowledged by the APIs

benchmarking_event_id.title: Benchmarking event
benchmarking_event_id.description: The unique id of the benchmarking event the dataset belongs to, as is returned by the API

participant_file.title: Participant file associated
participant_file.description: Path or URI (e.g. DOI) to the participant file associated with the consolidated results

community_id.title: OEB community
community_id.description: The unique id of the community where the data should be uploaded. Should come from VRE workflow

tool_id.title: Participant Tool
tool_id.description: The id of the tool used to generate the dataset. Should be selected by uploader, using API

data_version.title: Version
data_version.description: Version (or release date) of the dataset

workflow_oeb_id.title: OEB Workflow
workflow_oeb_id.description: The id of the workflow (as a tool) used to compute the assessment metrics. Should be associated to VRE tool

data_contacts.title: Contacts
data_contacts.description: Emails of the dataset contact(s). Should be registered in Mongo and OIDC, as they are going to be used to do the proper internal mappings

data_model_repo.title: OpenEBench benchmarking data model repository
data_model_repo.description: The git repository URI, needed to check out the data model

data_model_tag.title: Data model tag
data_model_tag.description: Either the tag, branch or checkout hash needed to fetch the right version of the data model

data_model_reldir.title: Data model relative path
data_model_reldir.description: Within a checked-out copy of the benchmarking data model repository, the relative path to the data model

data_storage_endpoint.title: Data storage endpoint (deprecated)
data_storage_endpoint.description: The endpoint representing the data preservation service to be used to upload the consolidated dataset descriptions and events
